statements: SELECT * FROM experimental_conditions WHERE duration_in_days > 7
SELECT condition_name, treatment FROM experimental_conditions WHERE condition_id = 2
SELECT * FROM experimental_conditions ORDER BY condition_name ASC
SELECT condition_name, duration_in_days FROM experimental_conditions WHERE treatment = 'Control'
SELECT AVG(duration_in_days) AS avg_duration FROM experimental_conditions
SELECT * FROM experimental_conditions WHERE condition_id = 1;
SELECT condition_name, treatment FROM experimental_conditions WHERE duration_in_days > 10 ORDER BY condition_name DESC;
SELECT MAX(duration_in_days) AS max_duration FROM experimental_conditions;
SELECT condition_id, treatment, duration_in_days FROM experimental_conditions WHERE condition_name LIKE '%acid%' ORDER BY duration_in_days ASC;
SELECT AVG(duration_in_days) AS avg_duration, COUNT(condition_id) AS total_conditions FROM experimental_conditions;
SELECT * FROM protein_expression;
SELECT protein_name, expression_level FROM protein_expression WHERE condition_id = 2;
SELECT protein_name, expression_level FROM protein_expression ORDER BY protein_name DESC;
SELECT condition_name, treatment FROM experimental_conditions WHERE condition_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM experimental_conditions ORDER BY condition_name ASC;
SELECT protein_name, expression_level FROM protein_expression WHERE condition_id = 1 ORDER BY expression_level DESC;
SELECT condition_name, treatment FROM experimental_conditions WHERE condition_id IN (2, 4) ORDER BY condition_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM protein_expression WHERE expression_level > 0.5 AND condition_id = 3 ORDER BY protein_name DESC;

SELECT condition_name, COUNT(*) AS protein_count FROM experimental_conditions LEFT JOIN protein_expression ON experimental_conditions.condition_id = protein_expression.condition_id GROUP BY condition_name HAVING protein_count > 1;

SELECT protein_name, condition_name, expression_level FROM protein_expression INNER JOIN experimental_conditions ON protein_expression.condition_id = experimental_conditions.condition_id WHERE expression_level < 0.3 ORDER BY condition_name ASC, protein_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM experimental_conditions;
SELECT treatment_name, treatment_duration FROM experimental_conditions ORDER BY treatment_duration DESC;
SELECT protein_name, expression_level FROM protein_expression WHERE expression_level > 5;
SELECT condition_id, result_date, measurement_type FROM experimental_results WHERE result_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT result_id, condition_id, result_value FROM experimental_results WHERE result_value < 0.05 ORDER BY result_value ASC;
SELECT * FROM experimental_conditions ORDER BY condition_id DESC;
SELECT treatment_name, treatment_description FROM experimental_conditions WHERE treatment_duration > 10;
SELECT protein_name, expression_level FROM protein_expression WHERE expression_level BETWEEN 5.0 AND 10.0 ORDER BY protein_name ASC;
SELECT result_id, result_date, measurement_type FROM experimental_results WHERE result_value > 100 ORDER BY result_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM experimental_results INNER JOIN protein_expression ON experimental_results.protein_id = protein_expression.protein_id;
SELECT * FROM experimental_conditions;
SELECT condition_name, treatment_name FROM experimental_conditions WHERE condition_id = 1;
SELECT protein_name, expression_level FROM protein_expression WHERE condition_id = 2 ORDER BY expression_level DESC;
SELECT treatment_name, treatment_description FROM treatment_details WHERE treatment_id = 3;
SELECT result_details FROM experiment_results WHERE protein_id = 4 AND condition_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM experimental_conditions;
SELECT protein_name, expression_level FROM protein_expression WHERE expression_level > 5;
SELECT treatment_name, treatment_description FROM treatment_details ORDER BY treatment_name DESC;

SELECT protein_name, expression_level, condition_name, treatment_name FROM protein_expression JOIN experimental_conditions ON protein_expression.condition_id = experimental_conditions.condition_id JOIN treatment_details ON experimental_conditions.treatment_id = treatment_details.treatment_id;
SELECT result_id, result_details FROM experiment_results WHERE protein_id = 1 AND condition_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM experimental_conditions;
SELECT treatment_name, temperature FROM experimental_conditions WHERE temperature > 25;
SELECT protein_name, expression_level FROM protein_expression ORDER BY expression_level DESC;
SELECT researcher_name, email FROM researchers WHERE researcher_id = 1;
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM research_projects WHERE end_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM experimental_conditions WHERE temperature > 25 ORDER BY treatment_duration DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT project_name, researcher_name FROM research_projects INNER JOIN researchers ON research_projects.researcher_id = researchers.researcher_id WHERE start_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT protein_name, expression_level FROM protein_expression WHERE expression_level > 0.5 ORDER BY expression_level DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT treatment_name, AVG(treatment_duration) AS avg_duration FROM experimental_conditions GROUP BY treatment_name HAVING AVG(treatment_duration) > 20;

SELECT project_name, result_value FROM research_projects INNER JOIN treatment_results ON research_projects.project_id = treatment_results.condition_id WHERE result_value < 0 ORDER BY result_date ASC LIMIT 5;
